#summary Place to store requests for cleaning up the books repository.

= Introduction =

It's well-known that the books could use cleanup, but it's a very large amount of effort to do so.  This wiki page serves as a wishlist/todo-list for people that are interested in making this happen.


= Details =

Items:
  * Improve performance of books/regex with faster implementations
  * Make books/regex easier to use
  * Pull out the proofs related to the ACL2 system from books/unicode and move them into books/system
  * Enhance books/str
